thread.title: Obama explains the difference between Black Lives Matter and 'all lives matter'
thread.title_full: Obama explains the difference between Black Lives Matter and 'all lives matter' - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama explains the difference between Black Lives Matter and 'all lives matter'
text: WASHINGTON — President Barack Obama offered a forceful defense of the Black Lives Matter movement on Thursday, while also explaining in detail the frustration with the use of the phrase “all lives matter,” which has been used by some
